channel.title: Mittens & Pants
channel.desc: Mittens struggles to play with her friend Boba when his fascination with rocks takes over every game.

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Gary's Magic Fort
channel.desc: When Gary wants to put on a Magic Day show, Sir Cushington gifts him his childhood wand; Gary learns that gifts given with love are the best kind, and to always say thank you.

channel.title: Molly of Denali
channel.desc: Molly and Randall accidentally lose a piece of the totem pole needed for the totem pole raising in Sitka.

channel.desc: When a little bird's friends show up, they all sing together in beautiful harmony.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Jeremy and Jazzy
channel.desc: Making art helps you bring your imagination to life with Jeremy and Jazzy.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Kingdom Force
channel.desc: Clepto Fernandez has her sights set on the Feline King's crown, and only Sprocket can stop her from taking it, but she may need the help of Kingdom Force to succeed.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: When Calls the Heart
channel.desc: A new Mountie arrives earlier than expected; Bill and Nathan jump right to work when Lee's payroll is stolen; at the school, friends turn against each other when a mock debate goes awry; Carson and Faith try to keep their romance a secret.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: BC Today
channel.desc: The show where British Columbians connect on issues facing their lives and their community.

channel.desc: A couple from Bedfordshire with a budget of ?450,000 need Ginny Buckley's help to find their first house in Norfolk.

channel.desc: The Lambert family tries to bank another $10,000 as they face the Dunford-Traynor family.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Son of a Critch
channel.desc: Fox volunteers Paul's house for a chaotic party, while Mark struggles to keep order; Mike Jr., Dick, and Amanda drive the Party Wagon, and Mary juggles tasks for her internship.

channel.title: Murdoch Mysteries
channel.desc: Murdoch and Brackenreid are stunned when an actor in a performance of "Hamlet" dies on stage before their eyes.

channel.name: CBC Vancouver CA
channel.title: Call the Midwife
channel.desc: Sister Julienne calms an anxious mother; Jenny's patient experiences complications; Chummy finds out that her mother has left her father; Trixie is disappointed when Ted cancels a date.
